intro.name: I'm Sean
intro.greeting: Welcome to my personal portfolio website.
intro.description: accessible, responsive, and modular web interfaces.

about.p1: Based in Paris, I’m a trilingual front-end developer (French, English, German) with a background in teaching and professional communication. I transitioned into web development in 2022 and quickly specialized in UI integration and front-end quality within structured, real-world environments.
about.p2: In 2023, I joined a two-year work-study program in software development while working at Abeille Assurances as a front-end developer / web integrator. There, I contributed to high-visibility projects, design systems, and UI consistency across large-scale platforms.
about.p3: My core stack includes React and Next.js, with strong foundations in JavaScript, UI architecture, and integration. I work comfortably within design systems, build scalable and reusable components, and collaborate closely with product and UX teams.
about.p4: I approach front-end work with a focus on maintainability, accessibility, performance, and clear architectural decisions. I enjoy structuring clean codebases that scale across teams and are easy to understand and evolve.
about.p5: I’m currently seeking a full-time front-end or UI-focused role, ideally in a consulting or product-driven environment where quality and collaboration matter.
